TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITrackingHandler

summary.span: 指示实现对象必须得到由远程结构发出的有关对象与代理的封送处理、取消封送处理和断开的通知。

span.span: Indicates that the implementing object must be notified of marshaling, unmarshaling, and disconnection of objects and proxies by the remoting infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用注册的每个对象在当前中的对象或代理被封送、取消封送或断开连接时调用。Every object that is registered with is called by remoting when an object or proxy in the current is marshaled, unmarshaled, or disconnected. 请注意, 只能断开对象的连接。Note that only objects can be disconnected. 如果在代理上调用了断开连接, 则会引发异常。An exception is thrown when disconnect is called on a proxy. > [!NOTE] > 此接口可进行链接请求。This interface makes a link demand. 如果直接调用方通过对接口的引用进行调用, 且没有基础结构权限, 则会引发 SecurityException。A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现接口的方法, 以便从远程处理基础结构接收通知。The following code example shows how to implement the methods of the interface to receive notifications from the remoting infrastructure. 下面的代码示例演示如何实现此接口。The following code example shows how to implement this interface. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/trackinghandler.cs#30)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在服务器上实现此接口。The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a server. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/server.cs#20)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在上一个代码示例中为服务器的客户端实现此接口。The following code example shows how to implement this interface on a client for the server in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/client.cs#0)] 下面的代码示例显示了服务器和客户端使用的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the server and the client. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/remoteservice.cs#10)]

permission.span: 用于处理基础结构代码。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisconnectedObject(object obj) cil managed

summary.span: 通知当前实例某个对象已与其代理断开连接。

span.span: Notifies the current instance that an object has been disconnected from its proxy.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现此方法。The following code example shows how to implement this method. 此代码示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the interface. Public Sub MarshaledObject (obj As Object, or As ObjRef)

abstract member MarshaledObject : obj * System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef -> unit

span.span: The object that has been marshaled.

param.name: or
param.span: ，它由封送处理产生，并表示指定的对象。

span.span: The that results from marshaling and represents the specified object.
